name: There Were Supposed To Be More Upgrades
name_original: There Were Supposed To Be More Upgrades
description:
You're a lone adventurer exploring an unknown land with your old air balloon, trying to find all the mystical ethynol gems of Alakar to explore the ancient spire.

Press Escape to reset your position.

Good luck.

Made in 48 hours by Jake Girton, Devon_Wiersma and Andrew Skarja for #ForgottenJam
